/* import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import InputGroup from 'react-bootstrap/InputGroup'; */ import axios from 'axios'; function DeleteModal(props){ const handleSubmit = async (movieData) => { movieData.preventDefault(); const serverUrl = `https://onlineserver-w9zu.onrender.com/getMovies/${props.movieData.id}`; const data = { id: movieData.target.id.value, title: movieData.target.title.value, release_date: movieData.target.release_date.value, poster_path: movieData.target.poster_path.value, overview:movieData.target.overview.value }; console.log("sssssss"); const axiosRes = await axios.delete(serverUrl, data); props.handleClose(); props.takeNewArrFromChild(axiosRes.data); }; return( <> {props.movieData.title} {/*


setOpinion(event.target.value)} />
*/} {/* Update Form
Movie ID Movie Title Movie Date Movie Image Movie overview
*/} ) } export default DeleteModal
